marklogic.body: I only watched it once but I think what you are remembering is she said something to the effect that maybe if she just lets them continue to go Off like they were, maybe people would see them for what they are...I can't remember her words exactly.Â But I honestly don't think her helping Colton had anything to do with that.Â I think it was genuine kindness of the sort Colton and Alicia neither one would knowÂ anything about.Â Yeah...you heardÂ a voiceover of her describing his Headache and the moment and then she said something like "who knows, maybe it will help me" but I really don't think that's what motiviated her initially, but I could be wrong.Â At the time she probably thought it was just a Headache and he'd get over it.Â When she saw him laying on the ground and then ran for help....that was genuine concern for him motivating her.Â He should be grateful to her for caring enough to bother considering how he treated her.
